entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning then northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 19.
